Partner Essentials FEATURED Integrated chronic condition programs improve more than just health outcomes In a recent study of more than 24,000 Teladoc Health members with multiple chronic conditions, the data consistently shows that integrated chronic care management programs result in better clinical outcomes, lower costs and a better member experience. Insights include: - Members enrolled in multiple programs engage more and see greater improvement. - For members with uncontrolled chronic conditions, our program delivers meaningful results immediately and sustains these results over time. “The results of this large-scale study clearly demonstrate the power and value of whole-person care. When people have access to a single, high-quality source of support for their chronic physical and mental health needs, they achieve better results across the board.” EVENTS Strategies for addressing whole-person care for those living with chronic conditions September 29 | 2 p.m. Eastern Register now <[[https://www.benefitnews.com/cms/preview/share-view?previewId=00000182-ad20-dde9-ab92-ede3ecb50000&bt_ee_preview=CdQFX68vQXkHkS6A9gqCKARFOh6%2B%2Fcn54fYp2PvgJaJJiPFGaUi7cU5w3ZbrjN2A&bt_ts_preview=1660762653950]]> During this live webinar, we will highlight key findings of the recent Teladoc Health consumer study on the impact of chronic condition management. Speakers: Glen Davis, MD, MBA VP, Clinical Programs, Teladoc Health Cameron Betts Senior Principal, Health & Benefits Consultant, Mercer Jessy Moreno Rosales VP, Total Rewards North America, SAP Moderator: Nabomita Dutta VP, Commercial Strategy, Teladoc Health SIIA’s National Conference 2022 October 9-11 | Phoenix, AZ Register now <[[https://www.siiaconferences.org/2022/index.cfm]]>
Let’s connect at the Self-Insurance Institute of America (SIIA), Inc., National Conference, the world’s largest self-insurance industry event with participation expected from employers, third-party administrators, captive managers/advisors, stop-loss carriers, brokers/consultants and a variety of specialty service providers.
